sourcesContent:
import {
  VStack,
  ButtonGroup,
  FormControl,
  FormLabel,
  Button,
  FormErrorMessage,
  Input,
} from "@chakra-ui/react";
import React from "react";

export const Login = () => {
  return (
    <VStack
      as="form"
      w={{ base: "90%", md: "500px" }}
      m="auto"
      justify="center"
      h="100vh"
      spacing="1rem"
    >
      <FormControl>
        <FormLabel>Username</FormLabel>
        <Input
          name="username"
          placeholder="Enter username"
          autoComplete="off"
        />
        <FormErrorMessage>Invalid username</FormErrorMessage>
      </FormControl>

      <FormControl>
        <FormLabel>Password</FormLabel>
        <Input
          name="password"
          placeholder="Enter password"
          autoComplete="off"
        />
        <FormErrorMessage>Invalid password</FormErrorMessage>
      </FormControl>

      <ButtonGroup>
        <Button colorScheme="teal" type="submit">
          Login
        </Button>
      </ButtonGroup>
    </VStack>
  );
};
